de.weltraumschaf.minesweeper.model

Interface FieldBox

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseMineFieldBox, MineBox, SaveBox

    public interface FieldBox
    Interface for mine field boxes.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add an observer.

      Count the mines in the direct neighborhood.

    • Method Detail

      • isMine

        boolean isMine()
        Whether the box is a mine or not.
        Returns:
        true if box is a mine, else false

      • isFlag

        boolean isFlag()
        Whether the box is flagged. If a box is flagged it can't be opened.
        Returns:
        true if box is flagged, else false

      • setFlag

        void setFlag(boolean flagged)
        Set the box flagged. If a box is flagged it can't be opened. A opened box can't be flagged.
        Parameters:
        flagged - true for flagging, else false

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Whether a box is open or not. A open box can not be closed or flagged gain. If it is a bomb the game is over.
        Returns:
        true if opened, else false

      • setOpened

        void setOpened(boolean open)
        Set the box opened. Should only perform any action, if not opened yet.
        Parameters:
        open - true for open box, else false

      • getField

        MineField getField()
        Get the field to which the box belongs.
        Returns:
        never null

      • getNeighbours

        List<FieldBox> getNeighbours()
        Get all direct neighbors of a box.
        Returns:
        contains at least 3 and maximum 8 boxes

      • countMinesInNeighborhood

        int countMinesInNeighborhood()
        Count the mines in the direct neighborhood.
        Returns:
        number in range [0,8]

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(Observer o)
        Add an observer.
        Parameters:
        o - must not be null

      • deleteObserver

        void deleteObserver(Observer o)
        Delete an observer.
        Parameters:
        o - must not be null

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers()
        Notify observers for changes. Dispatches to notifyObservers(java.lang.Object) with null as argument.

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers(Object arg)
        Notify observers for changes.
        Parameters:
        arg - may be null

      • deleteObservers

        void deleteObservers()
        Delete all observers.

      • hasChanged

        boolean hasChanged()
        Determine if box state has changed for observers.
        Returns:
        true if observers should be notified, else false

      • countObservers

        int countObservers()
        Count observers.
        Returns:
        not negative

      • getY

        int getY()
        Get the x-position in the mine field.
        Returns:
        [0, width - 1]

      • getX

        int getX()
        Get the y-position in the mine field.
        Returns:
        [0, width - 1]
